00023 #include "xmlbonusfile.h"
00024 
00028 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFile::xmlBonusFile(std::string fn){
00029   LOGI("Creates xmlBonusFile");
00030   this->filename=fn;
00031   refresh();
00032 }
00033 
00041 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFile::refresh(){
00042   LOGI("xmlBonusFile refresh function called");
00043   bool ret;
00044 
00045   GlobalURI gu;
00046   //  const char* filename=;
00047   //  const char* filename="http://127.0.0.1/rpg/persoattrb.xml";
00048   CurlFileToXml cgf;
00049   cgf.setFilename(gu.getXmlAdress(this->filename.c_str()));
00050   bool success= cgf.perform();
00051 
00052   if (success){
00053     if (loadDocument(&cgf)){
00054       ret=true;
00055     }
00056     else{
00057       ret=false;
00058       correctlyLoaded=false;
00059     }
00060   }
00061   else{
00062     long resp=cgf.getServerResponse();
00063     LOGE("An error occured while getting xmlBonusFile");
00064     cout << "Last server response : " << resp << endl;
00065     correctlyLoaded=false;
00066     ret=false;
00067   }
00068 
00069   return ret;
00070 }

00072 
00077 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFile::~xmlBonusFile(){
00078   doc=NULL;
00079   root=NULL;
00080 }
00081 
00089 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFile::loadDocument(
00090                                          CurlFileToXml* cgf){
00091 
00092   doc=cgf->getXmlDocument();
00093   if (doc){
00094     root =doc->RootElement();
00095     correctlyLoaded=true;
00096     LOGI("xmlBonusFile correctly loaded"); 
00097     return true;
00098   }
00099   else{
00100     correctlyLoaded=false;
00101     LOGW("An error occured while getting xmlBonusFile");
00102     return false;
00103   }
00104 }

00111 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tBonusFileChoiceList* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::
00112 xmlBonusFile::getChoiceList(){
00113   
00114   if (correctlyLoaded){
00115     tBonusFileChoiceList * cl=new tBonusFileChoiceList();
00116     
00117     TiXmlHandle docHandle( doc );
00118     TiXmlElement* child = docHandle.FirstChild( "BonusFile" )
00119       .FirstChild( "Choice" ).Element();
00120     
00121     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00122       
00123       tBonusFileChoiceListItem* it=new tBonusFileChoiceListItem();
00124       
00125       it->name  = getXMLTextFromName(child, "Name");
00126       it->desc  = getXMLTextFromName(child, "Desc");
00127       
00128       cl->push_back(it);
00129     }
00130     return cl;
00131   }
00132   else{
00133     LOGE("Cannot get choice list, document not loaded");
00134     return NULL;
00135   }
00136 
00137 }
00138 
00147 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFile::
00148                 getXMLTextFromName(TiXmlElement*child, const char* nodeName){
00149 
00150   TiXmlText* textNode;
00151 
00152   TiXmlNode* node=child->FirstChild(nodeName);
00153   if (node && node->FirstChild()){
00154     textNode=node->FirstChild()->ToText();
00155     if (textNode)
00156       return  textNode->Value();
00157     
00158     else  // !textNode
00159       return  "";
00160   }
00161   else    // !node
00162     return  "";
00163 }

00170 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tBonusModifierList* 
00171 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFile::
00172                     getModifierList(const char* choiceName){
00173 
00174   const char* name;
00175   TiXmlElement* modRoot;
00176 
00177   if (correctlyLoaded){
00178     // Creates the returned list
00179     tBonusModifierList* cl=new tBonusModifierList();
00180 
00181     // First, we get the god choice
00182     TiXmlHandle docHandle( doc );
00183     TiXmlElement* child = docHandle.FirstChild( "BonusFile" )
00184       .FirstChild( "Choice" ).Element();
00185     
00186     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00187       name  = getXMLTextFromName(child, "Name");
00188       if (strcmp ( choiceName, name)==0){
00189         // We have the good choice
00190         // We now get the 'AttributesModifiers' element
00191         modRoot=child->FirstChild("AttributesModifiers")->ToElement();
00192         // Next, get all the 'Modifier' nodes
00193         return makeModifierList(modRoot);
00194       }
00195     }
00196     return cl;
00197 
00198   }
00199   else{
00200     LOGE("Cannot get modifiers list, document not loaded");
00201     return NULL;
00202 
00203   }
00204 }
00205 
00213 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tBonusModifierList* 
00214 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFile::
00215 makeModifierList(TiXmlElement* modRoot){
00216 
00217     tBonusModifierList* cl=new tBonusModifierList();
00218     
00219     TiXmlHandle docHandle( modRoot );
00220     TiXmlElement* child = docHandle.FirstChild( "Modifier" )
00221       .Element();
00222     
00223     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00224       
00225       tBonusModifierListItem* it=new tBonusModifierListItem();
00226       
00227       it->attrb  = getXMLTextFromName(child, "Attrb");
00228       it->mod  = getXMLTextFromName(child, "Mod");
00229       
00230       cl->push_back(it);
00231     }
00232 
00233     return cl;
00234 }
